li.Students are responsible for meeting any: Students are responsible for meeting any prerequisites for the courses in the minor or for obtaining course instructor permission if prerequisites are not met.

courseSection0.text:
Admission Requirements
None
Minor Requirements
None
Prerequisite Courses
Students are responsible for meeting any prerequisites for the courses in the minor or for obtaining course instructor permission if prerequisites are not met.
Required Courses
None

li.A grade of \"C\" (2.0) or better is requ: A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 12 hours used in the minor must: At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
li.No more than 3 credit hours may overlap: No more than 3 credit hours may overlap with any other major or minor.

courseSection0.text:
Other Requirements

A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor.
At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
No more than 3 credit hours may overlap with any other major or minor.
